alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 5:02PM CST until December 09 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTY... At 501 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Walnut Grove, or 11 miles east of J P Coleman State Park, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Threet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
